mapper.select: SELECT A.ItemID, A.BrandID, B.BrandCN, B.BrandEN, A.CategoryID, C.CategoryCN, C.CategoryEN, A.SubCategoryID, D.SubCategoryCN, D.SubCategoryEN, A.ItemGroupID, J.ItemGroupCN, J.ItemGroupEN, A.SeriesID, A.ItemCode, E.ItemSeriesCN, E.ItemSeriesEN, A.UnitPrice4RMB, A.PromotionPrice4RMB, A.UnitPrice4USD, A.PromotionPrice4USD, A.Rate, A.ColorID, F.ColorCN, F.ColorEN, A.SizeID, G.SizeCN, G.SizeEN, A.ItemMaterial, A.MadeInID, I.CountryNameCN, I.CountryNameEN, A.ItemLength, A.AdjustLength, A.SuitablePetCN, A.SuitablePetEN, A.ItemShortDescriptionCN, A.ItemShortDescriptionEN, A.ItemDescriptionCN, A.ItemDescriptionEN, A.ItemStatus, (CASE A.ItemStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '待上架' WHEN 'N' THEN '已上架' WHEN 'E' THEN '已下架' END) AS ItemStatusText, A.ShowInListPage, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Item A LEFT JOIN Brand B ON A.BrandID = B.BrandID LEFT JOIN Category C ON A.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN SubCategory D ON A.SubCategoryID = D.SubCategoryID LEFT JOIN ItemSeries E ON A.SeriesID = E.SeriesID LEFT JOIN Color F ON A.ColorID = F.ColorID LEFT JOIN SizeMapping G ON A.SizeID = G.SizeID LEFT JOIN Country I ON A.MadeInID = I.CountryID LEFT JOIN ItemGroup J ON A.ItemGroupID = J.ItemGroupID ORDER BY InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.ItemID, A.BrandID, B.BrandCN, B.BrandEN, A.CategoryID, C.CategoryCN, C.CategoryEN, A.SubCategoryID, D.SubCategoryCN, D.SubCategoryEN, A.ItemGroupID, J.ItemGroupCN, J.ItemGroupEN, A.SeriesID, A.ItemCode, E.ItemSeriesCN, E.ItemSeriesEN, A.UnitPrice4RMB, A.PromotionPrice4RMB, A.UnitPrice4USD, A.PromotionPrice4USD, A.Rate, A.ColorID, F.ColorCN, F.ColorEN, A.SizeID, G.SizeCN, G.SizeEN, A.ItemMaterial, A.MadeInID, I.CountryNameCN, I.CountryNameEN, A.ItemLength, A.AdjustLength, A.SuitablePetCN, A.SuitablePetEN, A.ItemShortDescriptionCN, A.ItemShortDescriptionEN, A.ItemDescriptionCN, A.ItemDescriptionEN, A.ItemStatus, (CASE A.ItemStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '待上架' WHEN 'N' THEN '已上架' WHEN 'E' THEN '已下架' END) AS ItemStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Item A LEFT JOIN Brand B ON A.BrandID = B.BrandID LEFT JOIN Category C ON A.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN SubCategory D ON A.SubCategoryID = D.SubCategoryID LEFT JOIN ItemSeries E ON A.SeriesID = E.SeriesID LEFT JOIN Color F ON A.ColorID = F.ColorID LEFT JOIN SizeMapping G ON A.SizeID = G.SizeID LEFT JOIN Country I ON A.MadeInID = I.CountryID LEFT JOIN ItemGroup J ON A.ItemGroupID = J.ItemGroupID WHERE ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY InDate DESC

SELECT A.ItemID, A.BrandID, B.BrandCN, B.BrandEN, A.CategoryID, C.CategoryCN, C.CategoryEN, A.SubCategoryID, D.SubCategoryCN, D.SubCategoryEN, A.ItemGroupID, J.ItemGroupCN, J.ItemGroupEN, A.SeriesID, A.ItemCode, E.ItemSeriesCN, E.ItemSeriesEN, A.UnitPrice4RMB, A.PromotionPrice4RMB, A.UnitPrice4USD, A.PromotionPrice4USD, A.Rate, A.ColorID, F.ColorCN, F.ColorEN, A.SizeID, G.SizeCN, G.SizeEN, A.ItemMaterial, A.MadeInID, I.CountryNameCN, I.CountryNameEN, A.ItemLength, A.AdjustLength, A.SuitablePetCN, A.SuitablePetEN, A.ItemShortDescriptionCN, A.ItemShortDescriptionEN, A.ItemDescriptionCN, A.ItemDescriptionEN, A.ItemStatus, (CASE A.ItemStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '待上架' WHEN 'N' THEN '已上架' WHEN 'E' THEN '已下架' END) AS ItemStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Item A LEFT JOIN Brand B ON A.BrandID = B.BrandID LEFT JOIN Category C ON A.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN SubCategory D ON A.SubCategoryID = D.SubCategoryID LEFT JOIN ItemSeries E ON A.SeriesID = E.SeriesID LEFT JOIN Color F ON A.ColorID = F.ColorID LEFT JOIN SizeMapping G ON A.SizeID = G.SizeID LEFT JOIN Country I ON A.MadeInID = I.CountryID LEFT JOIN ItemGroup J ON A.ItemGroupID = J.ItemGroupID WHERE A.BrandID = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.CategoryID = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SubCategoryID = #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.ItemGroupID = #{arg3,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SeriesID = #{arg4,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.ColorID = #{arg5,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SizeID = #{arg6,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.ItemID, A.BrandID, B.BrandCN, B.BrandEN, A.CategoryID, C.CategoryCN, C.CategoryEN, A.SubCategoryID, D.SubCategoryCN, D.SubCategoryEN, A.ItemGroupID, J.ItemGroupCN, J.ItemGroupEN, A.SeriesID, A.ItemCode, E.ItemSeriesCN, E.ItemSeriesEN, A.UnitPrice4RMB, A.PromotionPrice4RMB, A.UnitPrice4USD, A.PromotionPrice4USD, A.Rate, A.ColorID, F.ColorCN, F.ColorEN, A.SizeID, G.SizeCN, G.SizeEN, A.ItemMaterial, A.MadeInID, I.CountryNameCN, I.CountryNameEN, A.ItemLength, A.AdjustLength, A.SuitablePetCN, A.SuitablePetEN, A.ItemShortDescriptionCN, A.ItemShortDescriptionEN, A.ItemDescriptionCN, A.ItemDescriptionEN, A.ItemStatus, (CASE A.ItemStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '待上架' WHEN 'N' THEN '已上架' WHEN 'E' THEN '已下架' END) AS ItemStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Item A LEFT JOIN Brand B ON A.BrandID = B.BrandID LEFT JOIN Category C ON A.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN SubCategory D ON A.SubCategoryID = D.SubCategoryID LEFT JOIN ItemSeries E ON A.SeriesID = E.SeriesID LEFT JOIN Color F ON A.ColorID = F.ColorID LEFT JOIN SizeMapping G ON A.SizeID = G.SizeID LEFT JOIN Country I ON A.MadeInID = I.CountryID LEFT JOIN ItemGroup J ON A.ItemGroupID = J.ItemGroupID WHERE A.ItemCode = #{itemCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

SELECT A.ItemID, A.BrandID, B.BrandCN, B.BrandEN, A.CategoryID, C.CategoryCN, C.CategoryEN, A.SubCategoryID, D.SubCategoryCN, D.SubCategoryEN, A.ItemGroupID, J.ItemGroupCN, J.ItemGroupEN, A.SeriesID, A.ItemCode, E.ItemSeriesCN, E.ItemSeriesEN, A.UnitPrice4RMB, A.PromotionPrice4RMB, A.UnitPrice4USD, A.PromotionPrice4USD, A.Rate, A.ColorID, F.ColorCN, F.ColorEN, A.SizeID, G.SizeCN, G.SizeEN, A.ItemMaterial, A.MadeInID, I.CountryNameCN, I.CountryNameEN, A.ItemLength, A.AdjustLength, A.SuitablePetCN, A.SuitablePetEN, A.ItemShortDescriptionCN, A.ItemShortDescriptionEN, A.ItemDescriptionCN, A.ItemDescriptionEN, A.ItemStatus, (CASE A.ItemStatus WHEN 'P' THEN '待上架' WHEN 'N' THEN '已上架' WHEN 'E' THEN '已下架' END) AS ItemStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Item A LEFT JOIN Brand B ON A.BrandID = B.BrandID LEFT JOIN Category C ON A.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN SubCategory D ON A.SubCategoryID = D.SubCategoryID LEFT JOIN ItemSeries E ON A.SeriesID = E.SeriesID LEFT JOIN Color F ON A.ColorID = F.ColorID LEFT JOIN SizeMapping G ON A.SizeID = G.SizeID LEFT JOIN Country I ON A.MadeInID = I.CountryID LEFT JOIN ItemGroup J ON A.ItemGroupID = J.ItemGroupID WHERE A.BrandID = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.CategoryID = #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SubCategoryID = #{arg2,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.SeriesID = #{arg3,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND (A.ItemNameCN = #{arg4,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR BINARY A.ItemNameEN = #{arg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Item ( BrandID, CategoryID, SubCategoryID, ItemGroupID, SeriesID, ItemCode, UnitPrice4RMB, PromotionPrice4RMB, UnitPrice4USD, PromotionPrice4USD, Rate, ColorID, SizeID, ItemMaterial, MadeInID, ItemLength, AdjustLength, SuitablePetCN, SuitablePetEN, ItemShortDescriptionCN, ItemShortDescriptionEN, ItemDescriptionCN, ItemDescriptionEN, ItemStatus, InUser, LastEditUser ) VALUES ( #{brandID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subCategoryID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemGroupID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice4RMB, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotionPrice4RMB, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitPrice4USD, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotionPrice4USD, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{colorID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizeID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemMaterial, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{madeInID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemLength, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustLength, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitablePetCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitablePetEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemShortDescriptionCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemShortDescriptionEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemDescriptionCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemDescriptionEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastEditUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Item SET BrandID = #{brandID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CategoryID = #{categoryID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SubCategoryID = #{subCategoryID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ItemGroupID = #{itemGroupID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SeriesID = #{seriesID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ItemCode = #{itemCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UnitPrice4RMB = #{unitPrice4RMB, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PromotionPrice4RMB = #{promotionPrice4RMB, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UnitPrice4USD = #{unitPrice4USD, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PromotionPrice4USD = #{promotionPrice4USD, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Rate = #{rate, jdbcType=FLOAT}, ColorID = #{colorID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SizeID = #{sizeID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ItemMaterial = #{itemMaterial, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MadeInID = #{madeInID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ItemLength = #{itemLength, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdjustLength = #{adjustLength, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuitablePetCN = #{suitablePetCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SuitablePetEN = #{suitablePetEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemShortDescriptionCN = #{itemShortDescriptionCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemShortDescriptionEN = #{itemShortDescriptionEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemDescriptionCN = #{itemDescriptionCN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemDescriptionEN = #{itemDescriptionEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemStatus = #{itemStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LastEditUser = #{lastEditUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
